messages.message:
@Nikolaos Kofinas we should update the ibformers CI config (https://github.com/instabase/ibformers/blob/main/ci/res/environments.yml)
Here is the PR (https://github.com/instabase/ibformers/pull/1056)
@Aaron Tami can we make it preserve the Recent projects? I guess it’s stored in the browser per domain
Hmm im not sure how that would work, I think that would require a code change to support that.

The migration away from dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com) will be delayed into early/mid next week. In the meantime, please continue to use platform.dogfood.instabase.com (http://platform.dogfood.instabase.com) - this URL is the best way to guarantee you are able to use dogfood without interruptions during the migration. Thank you!

Updating my bookmarks and I ran into a Q:
*Are our docs moving to the new subdomain?*  Or since they use a different subdirectory, are they staying the same?
Ex.
platform.instabase.com/docs (http://platform.instabase.com/docs)
VS
instabase.com/docs (http://instabase.com/docs)
docs is a great question - @jean would you know?

The public platform docs will stay where they are at instabase.com/docs/. The only docs that will move are the dogfood docs, which are the best way to see docs we’re developing for the next major release. Those will stay with the new dogfood.
